title: Database API
description: Get up an running with the Tableland SDK.

frontMatter.title: Database API
frontMatter.description: Get up an running with the Tableland SDK.
frontMatter.synopsis: The JavaScript / TypeScript SDK allows developers to create tables on their chain of choice. Connect, create, and then interact with your tables thereafter with table writes and reads. Dive into the basics for connecting, creating, writing, and reading from tables.
